text: The fictional Dune universe, or Duniverse, is the political, scientific, and social place from author Frank Herbert's six-book Dune series of science fiction novels. ==Works in the series== ===The original series=== *Dune (1965) *Dune Messiah (1969) *Children of Dune (1976) *God Emperor of Dune (1981) *Heretics of Dune (1984) *Chapterhouse Dune (1985) ==Characters== *Bene Gesserit are a group of woman (or sisterhood). They possess many seemingly supernatural abilities obtained through physical and mental training. ==Other websites==
title: Dune universe
